      • encodeTo

        public static boolean encodeTo(String src,
               byte[] dest,
               int offs)
        Encode a string into UTF-8 (except encoding character zero to its two-byte form).
        Parameters:
        src - the source string
        dest - the array to encode to
        offs - the offset into the destination array
        Returns:
        true if the string fit, false if it did not

        Find the first occurrence of a byte in a byte array.
        Parameters:
        array - the array to search
        search - the byte to search for
        offs - the offset in the array to start searching
        len - the length of the segment to search
        Returns:
        the index, or -1 if the byte is not found
